name: Phylum Chordata
column6: and post-anal tail at some life stage

name: Class Mammalia
definition: Warm-blooded animals that produce milk to feed their young and maintain constant body temperature

name: Order Carnivora
definition: Placental mammals specialized primarily in eating flesh

name: Family Felidae
definition: Cats characterized by digitigrade locomotion with five toes on forefeet and four on hind feet

name: Genus Panthera
definition: Large cats with incompletely ossified hyoid bone and specially adapted larynx enabling most to roar

name: Species Lion
definition: Large powerfully built cat that is second in size only to the tiger

name: Species Tiger
definition: Largest member of the cat family rivaled only by the lion in strength and ferocity

name: Species Leopard
definition: Large cat closely related to the lion

name: Genus Canis
definition: Species distinguished by moderate to large size
column6: and comparatively short ears and tails

name: Species Wolf
definition: Largest wild extant member of Canidae with less pointed ears and muzzle than other Canis species

name: Species Dog
definition: Domesticated descendant of the gray wolf selectively bred over 14

name: Genus Homo
definition: Great apes that emerged from Australopithecus
column4: with single extant species Homo sapiens

name: Species Human
column6: and ability to make standardized precision tools
